.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Evidence extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 定义组成对安全策略决策的输入的一组信息。

span.span: Defines the set of information that constitutes input to security policy decisions.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 证据的常见形式包括签名和代码源的位置，但也可能是任何内容。Common forms of evidence include signatures and location of origin of code, but can potentially be anything. 安全策略识别的任何类型的对象都表示证据。Objects of any type that are recognized by security policy represent evidence. 安全策略由代码组组成;特定程序集 (用于授予安全权限的基本代码单元（如果它满足代码组的成员资格条件，则) 是代码组的成员）。Security policy is composed of code groups; a particular assembly (the basic unit of code for granting security permissions) is a member of a code group if it satisfies the code group's membership condition. 证据是策略的一组输入，成员条件使用这些输入来确定程序集所属的代码组。Evidence is the set of inputs to policy that membership conditions use to determine to which code groups an assembly belongs. 类是一个集合 (请参阅 ) ，它包含一组表示证据的对象。The class is a collection (see ) that holds a set of objects that represent evidence. 此类包含两个与证据源相对应的集：主机证据和程序集证据。This class holds two sets that correspond to the source of the evidence: host evidence and assembly evidence. 当评估代码的权限时，策略可以从两个不同的源中获取证据。Policy can get evidence from two different sources when evaluating permissions for code. - `Host evidence` 由主机提供，并且只能由已被授予权限的主机提供 。`Host evidence` is provided by the host, and can only be provided by hosts that have been granted the permission. 通常，这是代码源的证据和程序集上的数字签名。Typically, this is evidence of the origin of the code and digital signatures on the assembly. 有关源的证据通常包括 、 和 证据。Evidence about origin typically includes , , and evidence. 签名指软件发行者 (AuthentiCode x.509v3 签名) 和强名称标识。Signatures refer to software publisher (AuthentiCode X.509v3 signature) and strong name identities. 这两种基于数字签名的标识内置于程序集中，但必须经过验证并通过主机传递到策略;加载后，安全系统将验证该签名。Both kinds of digital signature-based identity are built into the assembly, but must be validated and passed to policy by the host; when loaded, the security system verifies the signature. 然后，系统会创建相应的证据并仅在相应的签名有效时将其传递到策略。The system then creates the appropriate evidence and passes it to policy only if the corresponding signature is valid. - `Assembly evidence` 是程序集自身的一部分。`Assembly evidence` is part of the assembly itself. 开发人员或管理员可以将自定义证据附加到程序集，以便为策略扩展一组证据。Developers or administrators can attach custom evidence to the assembly to extend the set of evidence for policy. 只能在程序集生成时添加程序集证据，这在程序集签名之前发生。Assembly evidence can only be added at the time of assembly generation, which occurs before the assembly is signed. 安全系统的默认策略忽略程序集提供的证据，但可以扩展策略来接受它。The default policy of the security system ignores assembly-provided evidence, but policy can be extended to accept it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 具有主机证据和程序集证据的新类。The following code example demonstrates how to create new classes with both host evidence and assembly evidence. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.Evidence#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Evidence/CPP/evidence_evidence.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.Evidence#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Evidence/CS/evidence_evidence.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.Evidence#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Evidence/VB/evidence_evidence.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此方法用于从程序集派生的证据。Use this method for evidence derived from the assembly. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不执行检查来阻止添加重复类型的证据。This method does not perform a check to prevent adding duplicate types of evidence. 许多程序集证据对象可以同时存在。Many assembly evidence objects can exist at the same time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的用法 。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能添加旧证据，即不是派生自的证据 。Legacy evidence, that is, evidence that is not derived from , cannot be added. 仅可添加派生自的证据 。Only evidence that is derived from can be added. 如果程序集列表中已经存在该类型的证据，则此方法不允许添加证据。This method does not allow you to add evidence if evidence of that type already exists in the assembly list.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

summary.span: 获取 对象的哈希代码，此代码适合在哈希算法和数据结构（例如哈希表）中使用。

span.span: Gets a hash code for the object that is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.

returns.span: 当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: A hash code for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同一证据的两个实例的哈希代码可能不同，因此，哈希代码不应用于比较两个 对象。The hash code for two instances of the same evidence might be different, Therefore, hash codes should not be used to compare two objects. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 GetHashCode 方法。The following code example shows the use of the GetHashCode method. 此示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. ```vb Console.WriteLine(ControlChars.Lf & "Get the hashcode for the evidence.") Console.WriteLine(("HashCode = " & myEvidence.GetHashCode().ToString())) ``` ```csharp Console.WriteLine("\nGet the hashcode for the evidence."); Console.WriteLine("HashCode = " + myEvidence.GetHashCode().ToString()); ``` ```cpp Console::WriteLine( "\nGet the hashcode for the evidence." ); Console::WriteLine( "HashCode = {0}", myEvidence->GetHashCode() ); ```

returns.span: 主机证据集合中 类型的证据。

span.span: Evidence of type in the host evidence collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只返回派生自类的证据 。This method returns only evidence that is derived from the class. 它不会返回派生自其他类的旧证据对象。It does not return legacy evidence objects that are derived from other classes.

span.span: The evidence set to be merged into the current evidence set.

summary.span: 将指定的证据集合并到当前证据集。

span.span: Merges the specified evidence set into the current evidence set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定证据集中的每个证据对象都会根据其来源的集添加到当前证据集的程序集和主机集。Each evidence object in the specified evidence set is added to the assembly and host sets of the current evidence set, according to the sets from which it came. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不执行检查来阻止添加重复类型的证据。This method does not perform a check to prevent adding duplicate types of evidence. 许多程序集和主机证据对象可以同时存在。Many assembly and host evidence objects can exist at the same time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的用法 。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
